title: The Long haul men
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, John Kemeny and Michael Rubbo
brief_description: A drive with long-distance truckers freighting produce over highways between Mexico, the western States and Calgary. The film shows how the diversity of country and climate creates the daily experience of the truckers, and the link that this type of transport forms between different parts of the continent.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, John Kemeny and Michael Rubbo
